title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, it is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. To improve this, all actions should be reachable from the editor, either in the context menu or via the Edit menu.
OB: The 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is not available in the context menu.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc Comment' action should be available in the context menu.
SR:
1. Open the editor.
2. Select some text.
3. Right-click to open the context menu.
4. Check if the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is listed in the context menu. If not, proceed to step 5.
5. Go to the 'Edit' menu.
6. Check if the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is listed in the menu.
